question: Who of the following was awarded the Globe Soccer's Best Player award in Dubai?
explanation: Cristiano Ronaldo of Real Madrid was awarded the Globe Soccer's Best Player award, in Dubai. Cristiano Ronaldo has won the Globe Soccer's Best Player award for the second consecutive year and fourth time overall. And Real Madrid club was named the best club of the year. Also, Real Madrid coach Zinedine Zidane was given the best coach award.
